title: Home Page, Alaska Department of Fish and Game
description: Official Home Page for the Alaska Department of Fish and Game.
cleaned_text: Alaska Department of Fish and Game Home Highlights [ADF&G to Test new Selective Harvest Setnet Gear](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/home/news/pressreleases/pdfs/adfg_test_selective_harvest_setnet_gear_07062023.pdf) [2023 - 2024 Alaska Hunting Regulations Now Available](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/index.cfm?adfg=wildliferegulations.hunting) [ADF&G Concludes Predator Control for the Year to Benefit Mulchatna Caribou](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/applications/publicnotification/2023/releases/R4-AA-23-1050.pdf) [NOAA Fisheries Announces Federal Fishery Disaster Allocations](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/home/news/pressreleases/pdfs/noaa_fisheries_disaster_allocation_05_19_2023.pdf) [State to Appeal Ruling that Unfairly Attacks Southeast Alaska Chinook Fisheries](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/home/news/pressreleases/pdfs/state_appeal_ruling_southeast_alaska_chinook_fisheries_05_03_2023.pdf) [Vincent-Lang Names Payton as Director of Sport Fish](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/home/news/pressreleases/pdfs/vincent_lang_payton_director_sport_fish_05_01_2023.pdf) [Alaska Bycatch Advisory Council Created by Commissioner of Fish and Game](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/index.cfm?adfg=pressreleases.pr&release=2023_03_13) [New Pacific Salmon Treaty Chinook Catch Limits for Southeast Alaska](https://www.adfg.alaska.gov/static/home/news/pressreleases/pdfs/adfg_press_release_pacific_salmon_treaty_chinook_catch_limits_02_24_2023.pdf) Fishing & Hunting - [Fishing](/index.cfm?adfg=fishing.main) - [Hunting & Shooting](/index.cfm?adfg=hunting.main) - [Boards and [Float Basics](/index.cfm?adfg=outdooreducation.bowschedule): Fairbanks, - (Alaskans Fairbanks, September 13 - [Alaskans Afield Dutch Oven Baking: Cinnamon Rolls and Biscuits (Alaskans Fairbanks, September 19
